about_the_game:
You find yourself crashed landed on an alien archipelago, Rimorius. A small creature begins to follow you along the island and a distant war horn blows as it becomes nightfall. Discover the power of Fledglings through your care and resilience.

Creature Collection
Nurture and protect young Fledglings until they reach adulthood. Build a party of different Fledglings that have their own meal preferences, behaviors, and attack patterns.


Wave Defense
Meet territorial enemies from the deep abyss. They come in swarms and various forms to drive your off of their homeland. Fight each night to continue to survive and grow your Fledglings.


Dynamic Day/Night Cycle
Experience dynamic weather and lighting for an immersive Day/Night cycle. Enjoy the relaxing, bright nature of the day and be prepared to fight in the dark, creepy night.


Beat Your Highscore
Progress at your own pace and determine the difficulty of your run by traversing different islands. Those who seek out a challenge will be rewarded.

name: Fledglings

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Crash landed on an alien archipelago, you must raise native Fledglings to fight off waves of sea creatures at night. Collect Fledglings, scavenge for resources, and survive the nights with the help of your companions.
